title: Do You Have a Strong Circle of Friends? Hereâ€™s How to Tell
sub_head: It is time to take stock of friendships, weighing who matters, what is missing and how to build your A-team
body:
Ready to re-create a more normal social life? Take this opportunity to rethink your circle of friends.
We are in a rare moment when we can rebuild our social networks better than they were before the pandemic. Many of us have reflected over the past two years on the things that are truly important and make us happiest at work and at home. Now it is time to do this with our friendships, weighing who matters, what is missing and how to build our A-team.
